name: Desert Force: Rescue Mission
summary:
Special mission to the special force to handle a war in the land of middle east. You are a special man in this force who are given difficult task to handle the war in the middle east.

You must use good tactics and your skills to fight the enemy. And you must be careful from the terrorist.

Complete the deadly missions in the land of middle east, to fight the terrorist.
There are 15 stages of different difficulty levels, play and feel the tense atmosphere when you fight the enemy forces.
